title: Serving the Country - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Ancient China   Death of Loved Ones   Hard-Working Protagonist   Revenge

description: Rather than wandering the nine continents upholding justice by yourself, it is better to work with the government to bring about prosperity together. Don’t talk about etiquette and shamelessness with me! I’m forever a shou. My name is Dian Qian Huan.>
